page.title: 06CRAMOND :A Schoolgirl's View
page.content: On schooldays I rise at 0730, dress in my uniform and grab my schoolbag before I dash downstairs for fruit juice, milk and toast.I usually walk to school in time for the bell at 0855 when lessons in Language and Maths begin. I enjoy my Environmental Studies project, this term River Studies. Last term I enjoyed handcraft and the gym we did in the hall. In the summer we have more sport out-of-doors and I'm not so good at that.Lunchtime is 1205-1300. I have a pack of sandwiches and fruit. I could buy a school dinner for 50p. After school my homework takes about 30 minutes, then I practice trying to ride my bicycle. I like to read,write plays and make models
